summary: The diff implements most of the required features for the StyleMart clothing e-commerce application. The backend is updated with clothing-specific fields, the frontend is redesigned with a Flipkart-inspired theme, category filtering and search are implemented, a product detail modal is added, the cart supports clothing-specific attributes, and responsive design is applied. The primary gap is REQ-14: product images in the seeded backend data use external Unsplash URLs rather than the required /assets/generated/ path. The Header and hero banner do reference /assets/generated/ paths correctly.

missing_requirements.requirement: All product images should load from /assets/generated/ directory using the generated static image files
missing_requirements.reason: The backend seed data in backend/main.mo uses external Unsplash URLs (e.g., 'https://source.unsplash.com/400x400/?jeans') for all product imageUrls instead of the required /assets/generated/product-*.dim_400x400.png paths. The logo and hero banner reference /assets/generated/ correctly, but the 20 product image URLs do not match the required generated asset paths.

hallucinated_features.description: A migration module (backend/migration.mo) was added to handle schema migration from old dairy product types to new clothing product types
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request does not mention any migration module or data migration requirement. The request only asks to seed the backend with new clothing products; no migration from an old schema was requested.
